#note: Please do not publicize these code lines or distribute a modified version of the mod - keep this to yourself. Thanks! Also I am not doing this for 10k+ levels so know that this applies to all of them - DT

objdata.//: A stationary griditem will not move with the cart, but neither will it prevent cart movement.
objdata.#comment: ImmovablePlants: Plants which cannot be moved along with Railcart (when railcart is moved)

objdata.//: Cannot spawn (excluded)items in the list on top of current grid item(sap)
Excluding these items in the list, all other griditems can override(washoff) sap

objdata.#comment: We can only use Lost City basics here because of the extra coming-out-of-tent animation
